title: Members List
description: Information about members in a specific list.

id.title: List ID
id.description: A string that uniquely identifies this list.

email_address.title: Email Address
email_address.description: The email address of the member.

unique_email_id.title: Unique Email ID
unique_email_id.description: A unique identifier for the member's email address.

contact_id.title: Contact ID
contact_id.description: The identifier for the member's contact.

full_name.title: Full Name
full_name.description: The full name of the member.

web_id.title: Web ID
web_id.description: An integer that uniquely identifies the member on the web.

email_type.title: Email Type
email_type.description: The type of email associated with the member.

status.title: Status
status.description: The subscription status of the member.

unsubscribe_reason.title: Unsubscribe Reason
unsubscribe_reason.description: The reason for the member's unsubscribe, if applicable.

consents_to_one_to_one_messaging.title: Consents to One-to-One Messaging
consents_to_one_to_one_messaging.description: Indicates whether the member consents to one-to-one messaging.

merge_fields.title: Merge Fields
merge_fields.description: Additional merge fields for the member.

property1.title: Property 1
property1.description: The value of property 1 for the member.

property2.title: Property 2
property2.description: The value of property 2 for the member.

property1.title: Property 1
property1.description: Indicates the interest status of property 1 for the member.

property2.title: Property 2
property2.description: Indicates the interest status of property 2 for the member.

avg_open_rate.title: Average Open Rate
avg_open_rate.description: The average open rate of the member.

avg_click_rate.title: Average Click Rate
avg_click_rate.description: The average click rate of the member.

ecommerce_data.title: Ecommerce Data
ecommerce_data.description: Ecommerce data related to the member.

total_revenue.title: Total Revenue
total_revenue.description: The total revenue generated by the member.

number_of_orders.title: Number of Orders
number_of_orders.description: The number of orders placed by the member.

currency_code.title: Currency Code
currency_code.description: The currency code used for revenue.

ip_signup.title: IP Signup
ip_signup.description: The IP address used during signup.

ip_opt.title: IP Opt
ip_opt.description: The IP address used for opting.

last_changed.title: Last Changed
last_changed.description: The timestamp of the last change.

language.title: Language
language.description: The language preference of the member.

vip.title: VIP
vip.description: Indicates if the member is a VIP.

email_client.title: Email Client
email_client.description: The email client used by the member.

latitude.title: Latitude
latitude.description: The latitude of the member's location.

longitude.title: Longitude
longitude.description: The longitude of the member's location.

gmtoff.title: GMT Offset
gmtoff.description: The GMT offset of the member's location.

dstoff.title: DST Offset
dstoff.description: The DST offset of the member's location.

country_code.title: Country Code
country_code.description: The country code of the member's location.

timezone.title: Timezone
timezone.description: The timezone of the member's location.

region.title: Region
region.description: The region of the member's location.

marketing_permission_id.title: Marketing Permission ID
marketing_permission_id.description: The ID of the marketing permission.

text.title: Text
text.description: The text of the marketing permission.

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: Indicates if the marketing permission is enabled.

last_note.title: Last Note
last_note.description: Last note related to the member.

tags_count.title: Tags Count
tags_count.description: The count of tags associated with the member.

list_id.title: List ID
list_id.description: A string that uniquely identifies this list.

method.title: Method
method.description: The HTTP method of the link.
